actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain individuals will not be treated as manufacturers for purposes of the excise tax on sporting goods or firearms, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exempt from the manufacturers excise tax on sporting goods and firearms certain individuals who do not manufacture or produce more than 50 of such articles per year.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that certain individuals will not be treated as manufacturers for purposes of the excise tax on sporting goods or firearms, and for other purposes.
